thread.title: Brooklyn Beckham 'Didn't Actually Know' His Parents David and Victoria Beckham Were Famous Until Age 13
thread.title_full: Brooklyn Beckham 'Didn't Actually Know' His Parents David and Victoria Beckham Were Famous Until Age 13

author: Alex Ungerman
title: Brooklyn Beckham 'Didn't Actually Know' His Parents David and Victoria Beckham Were Famous Until Age 13
text: Brooklyn Beckham 'Didn't Actually Know' His Parents David and Victoria Beckham Were Famous Until Age 13 by Alex Ungerman 3:58 PM   Brooklyn Beckham 'Didn't Actually Know' His Parents David and Victoria Beckham Were Famous Until Age 13 Why would a kid think Mom and Dad were anything more than... Mom and Dad? Brooklyn Beckham, who appears on the latest cover of Wonderland , expresses as much inside the magazine's Spring Issue, where the son of soccer star David Beckham and Spice Girl-turned-fashion icon Victoria Beckham admits he didn't really know anything about his parents' fame until he turned 13. A post shared by bb (@brooklynbeckham) on Feb 19, 2017 at 6:27am PST WATCH: David Beckham Goes Snowboarding for the First Time as Son Brooklyn Suffers Scary Injury on the Slopes "I didn’t actually know that they were big until I was about 13," the now 17-year-old confesses. "I went to a football game and people were shouting my dad’s name and I was like, ‘What?! Oh my God.’ I don’t look at them like that." But despite the revelation, it was important for Brooklyn to blaze his own career path. "It’s pretty exciting to put my work out there and show people that I’m not just doing it because of who my parents are," he explained, addressing his upcoming photography book, What I See , which is set to hit shelves on May 4.
